qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, what are the occupations of patients Q. Reyes and Q. Gomez?

content: Occupation and Working Conditions: Retired teacher, previously under no significant occupational hazards.
- Occupation and Working Conditions: Graphic designer, frequent screen use

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization record of Lexington General Hospital, patient Q. Reyes was a retired teacher; according to the hospitalization record of Ashland City Hospital, patient Q. Gomez is a graphic designer.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, what are the marital statuses of patients Q. Reyes and Q. Gomez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization record of Lexington General Hospital, patient Q. Reyes was widowed; according to the hospitalization record of Ashland City Hospital, patient Q. Gomez is single.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, what were the chief complaints of patients Q. Reyes and Q. Gomez?

content: Dysphagia and chest pain for the past 4 months
- Blurred vision and severe headache for 3 days

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization record of Lexington General Hospital, the chief complaint of patient Q. Reyes was dysphagia and chest pain for the past 4 months; according to the hospitalization record of Ashland City Hospital, the chief complaint of patient Q. Gomez was blurred vision and severe headache for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, what are the surgeries recorded in the history of patients Q. Reyes and Q. Gomez?

content: Surgery and Trauma History: Appendectomy at age 25.
- Surgery and Trauma History: Appendectomy at age 22

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization record of Lexington General Hospital, patient Q. Reyes had an appendectomy at age 25; according to the hospitalization record of Ashland City Hospital, patient Q. Gomez had an appendectomy at age 22.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, what diagnoses were made for patients Q. Reyes and Q. Gomez?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization record of Lexington General Hospital, patient Q. Reyes was diagnosed with esophageal malignancy; according to the hospitalization record of Ashland City Hospital, patient Q. Gomez was diagnosed with acute angle-closure glaucoma.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, who was admitted earlier, Q. Reyes or Q. Gomez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Q. Reyes was admitted on August 5th, and Q. Gomez was admitted on April 9th. Q. Gomez was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Lexington General Hospital and Ashland City Hospital, who is older, Q. Reyes or Q. Gomez?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: Q. Reyes is 87 years old, and Q. Gomez is 28 years old. Q. Reyes is older.
